entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
